resources.string: The Golden Retriever is a Scottish breed of retriever dog of medium size.
The Labrador Retriever or simply Labrador is a British breed of retriever gun dog.
The German Shepherd, also known in Britain as an Alsatian, is a German breed of working dog of medium to large size.
The Poodle, called the Pudel in German and the Caniche in French, is a breed of water dog.
The Bulldog is a British breed of dog of mastiff type. It may also be known as the English Bulldog or British Bulldog.
The beagle is a breed of small scent hound, similar in appearance to the much larger foxhound.
The dachshund, also known as the wiener dog or sausage dog, badger dog and doxie, is a short-legged, long-bodied, hound-type dog breed.
The Chihuahua is a Mexican breed of toy dog.
The Pug is a breed of dog with the physically distinctive features of a wrinkly, short-muzzled face, and curled tail.
See more or less information about a heroes.
